script: Don’t worry, you get to keep your same home phone number. On the day of switch over, there’s no downtime – it switches seamlessly to us. Do you use your home phone much?
Broadband quality usually depends on your distance from the exchange, internal wiring, and your router – not your provider. We offer multiple options, so your speed can stay the same or even improve.
We use the EE network – the UK’s largest for coverage. I’ve personally never had any issues. How many mobiles do you have in the house?
Switching your energy is seamless. You won’t lose power, and you don’t even need to contact your old supplier. Everything is handled for you.
We’re one of the UK’s greenest energy suppliers. Our green fixed tariff means 100% renewable electricity, and we plant around 100,000 trees per year. It’s a real commitment to sustainability.
